name: Rhyperior
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: A Rhyperior’s brain is smaller than a Rhydon’s, but the Rhyperior is stronger because it spends more energy on battling and less on brainpower.

abilities.name: Wide Wall
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, whenever your opponent plays a Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to all of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Drill Run
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
